en.msg_index2_05_you_still_have_daypasses: You still have some daypasses left on this hotspot. Do you want to delete it and start new registration?
en.msg_index2_06_daypasses_will_be_lost: All remaining daypasses will be lost.
en.msg_index2_08_enter_act_number: If you are a recurring user and already have an ACTIVATION CODE please enter it here:
en.msg_index2_12_welcome: Welcome to LMA Systems Mobile WiFi service!
en.msg_index2_13_new_user: If you are a NEW USER please click here
en.msg_index2_18_data_collected: Your usage data will be collected
en.msg_index2_19_data_not_collected: Your usage data will <u>NOT</u> be collected
en.msg_index2_20_paid_info_text: Thank you for choosing the LMA Systems Paid WiFi Service. You will receive unlimited 4G/LTE connectivity without personalised advertisement and no data will be collected.
en.msg_index2_21_free_info_text: Thank you for choosing the LMA Systems Free WiFi Service. You will receive unlimited 4G/LTE connectivity, personalised advertisement and your anonymised data will be collected according to the EU Data Protection Laws.
en.msg_index2_22_price_one_daypass: Price for one daypass (24 hours) is :&nbsp
en.msg_p_act_succ_01_daypass_activation_suc:
Your LMA Systems Mobile Hotspot is now ready to use.
Please activate your hotspot!
en.msg_p_act_fail_03_buy_or_contact: Buy new daypasses or contact our support.
en.msg_p_new_05_include_country_code: Please select country code and enter mobile phone number.
en.msg_p_new_11_billing_payment_info: Billing and payment details: will be used for your future purchases (e.g additional Daypasses) and for the deposit of your rental hotspot.
en.msg_p_new_12_email_address_info: Email Address: will be used to send you confirmations and invoices.
en.msg_f_new_01_please_fill_out_fields_belo: Please fill out the following anonymous survey to receive unlimited free data:
en.msg_f_new_10_first_time_to_city: Is this your first time visit to Vienna
en.msg_f_new_15_please_fill_out_form: Please fill out the following section in order to log in with your other personal devices without having to fill out this form again. You will receive an activation code via text message (no roaming charges will occur).
en.msg_f_new_16_grand_permission: I accept to receive location-based services through my messaging apps
en.msg_p_dp_add_01_creditcard_associated: We will use your credit card associated with this account
en.msg_p_enter_code_01_will_receive_sms: Once you receive the text message/SMS please enter it here.Please store the code, you will need it later re-activate your hotspot.
en.msg_p_enter_code_02_please_store_number: You can share the code amongst your family and friends connected to the same hotspot.
en.msg_p_summary_01_24-daypass_stay_active: The 24-hour Daypass will be active until:
en.msg_general_02_advert_popup_text: The page will be loaded later...
en.msg_general_17_terms_accept: I accept the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy in accordance to the EU GDPR
en.msg_general_18_banner_click: Click on the Banner and automatically receive the voucher/ad via email
en.msg_general_19_how_many_daypass_buy: How many new daypasses you want to buy?
en.msg_general_23_phone_number_will_activat: We will send SMS code to your phone number to activate the device

il.msg_index2_05_you_still_have_daypasses: נשארו לך מספר תוכניות על המכשיר. האם תרצה/י למחוק אותן ולהתחיל רישום מחדש?
il.msg_index2_08_enter_act_number: הקלד/י את הקוד האישי שלך כדי לשימוש באינטרנט!
il.msg_index2_20_paid_info_text: Thank you for choosing the LMA Systems Paid WiFi Service. You will receive unlimited 4G/LTE connectivity without personalised advertisement and no data will be collected.
il.msg_index2_21_free_info_text: Thank you for choosing the LMA Systems Free WiFi Service. You will receive unlimited 4G/LTE connectivity, personalised advertisement and your anonymised data will be collected according to the EU Data Protection Laws.
il.msg_index2_22_price_one_daypass: Price for one daypass (24 hours) is :
il.msg_p_act_fail_03_buy_or_contact: רכוש/י תוכניות חדשות או פנה/י לשירות הלקוחות שלנו.
il.msg_p_new_05_include_country_code: בחר/י קוד מדינה ומלא/י מספר טלפון נייד
il.msg_p_new_11_billing_payment_info: פרטי חיוב ותשלום: ישמשו אותך לרכישות עתידיות ולפיקדון על המכשיר.
il.msg_p_new_12_email_address_info: דואר אלקטרוני: ישמש אותך כדי לשלוח לך אישורים וחשבוניות.
il.msg_f_new_01_please_fill_out_fields_belo: נא למלא את השדות למטה כדי לקבל נתונים ללא הגבלה ליום.
il.msg_f_new_15_please_fill_out_form: מלא/י את החלק הבא כדי להיכנס עם המכשירים האישיים האחרים שלך מבלי למלא טופס זה שוב. את/ה תקבל/י קוד הפעלה באמצעות מסרון (ללא דמי נדידה).
il.msg_f_new_16_grand_permission: אני מסכים/מה לקבל שירותים מבוססי מיקום באמצעות יישומי ההודעות שלי
il.msg_p_dp_add_01_creditcard_associated: הרכישה תתבצע בכרטיס האשראי המשויך לחשבונך
il.msg_p_enter_code_01_will_receive_sms: כעת תקבל מסרון עם מספר ההפעלה האישי שלך.
il.msg_p_enter_code_02_please_store_number: נא לשמור על מספר זה להזדהות חוזרת והפעלת התוכנית שנרכשה.
il.msg_p_summary_01_24-daypass_stay_active: תוכנית 24 שעות ביממה תהיה פעילה עד:
il.msg_general_01_enter_number: הקלד את הקוד האישי שלך כאן
il.msg_general_18_banner_click: לחץ על הבאנר ולקבל באופן אוטומטי את השובר / המודעה באמצעות הדואל
il.msg_general_23_phone_number_will_activat: אנו נשלח קוד למספר הטלפון שלך להפעלת ההתקן.

de.msg_index2_04_please_wait: Bitte warten Sie auf die Verbindung...
de.msg_index2_05_you_still_have_daypasses: You still have some daypasses left on this hotspot. Do you want to delete it and start new registration?
de.msg_index2_06_daypasses_will_be_lost: All remaining daypasses will be lost.
de.msg_index2_08_enter_act_number: Bitte geben Sie Ihre persönliche Nummer ein, um die Daypass zu aktivieren!
de.msg_index2_20_paid_info_text: Thank you for choosing the LMA Systems Paid WiFi Service. You will receive unlimited 4G/LTE connectivity without personalised advertisement and no data will be collected.
de.msg_index2_21_free_info_text: Thank you for choosing the LMA Systems Free WiFi Service. You will receive unlimited 4G/LTE connectivity, personalised advertisement and your anonymised data will be collected according to the EU Data Protection Laws.
de.msg_index2_22_price_one_daypass: Price for one daypass (24 hours) is :
de.msg_p_act_fail_01_daypass_activation_fai: Die Aktivierung des Tagespasses ist fehlgeschlagen!!!
de.msg_p_act_fail_03_buy_or_contact: Kaufen Sie neue Tagespasses oder kontaktieren Sie unsere SUPPORT.
de.msg_p_new_05_include_country_code: Bitte wählen Sie die Landesvorwahl und geben Sie die Handynummer ein.
de.msg_p_new_10_enter_personal_details: Bitte geben Sie Ihre persönlichen Daten ein!
de.msg_p_new_11_billing_payment_info: Rechnungs- und Zahlungsdetails:: werden für Ihre zukünftigen Einkäufe (z. B. zusätzliche Tageskarten) und für die Hinterlegung Ihres Miet-Hotspots verwendet.
de.msg_p_new_12_email_address_info: E-Mail-Adresse: wird verwendet, um Ihnen Bestätigungen und Rechnungen zu senden.
de.msg_f_new_01_please_fill_out_fields_belo: Bitte füllen Sie die folgenden Felder aus um kostenlosen unlimiterten WiFI Zugang zu erhalten
de.msg_f_new_10_first_time_to_city: Sind Sie das erste Mal in der Stadt
de.msg_f_new_15_please_fill_out_form: Bitte füllen Sie den folgenden Abschnitt aus, um sich mit Ihren anderen persönlichen Geräten anzumelden, ohne dieses Formular erneut ausfüllen zu müssen. Sie erhalten einen Aktivierungscode per SMS (keine Roaming-Gebühren).
de.msg_f_new_16_grand_permission: Ich akzeptiere standortbasierte Dienste über meine Messaging-Apps
de.msg_p_dp_add_01_creditcard_associated: Wir verwenden Ihre mit diesem Konto verknüpfte Kreditkarte
de.msg_p_enter_code_01_will_receive_sms: Sie erhalten in Kürze eine SMS mit Ihrer persönlichen Aktivierungsnummer.
de.msg_p_enter_code_02_please_store_number: Bitte speichern Sie es sorgfältig, Sie werden es später für die Aktivierung von Tagespässen benötigen.
de.msg_general_18_banner_click: Klicken Sie auf das Banner und erhalten Sie den Gutschein / die Anzeige automatisch per E-Mail
de.msg_general_19_how_many_daypass_buy: Wie viele neue Tagespasses möchten Sie kaufen?
de.msg_general_23_phone_number_will_activat: Wir werden SMS-Code an Ihre Telefonnummer senden, um das Gerät zu aktivieren

fr.msg_index2_05_you_still_have_daypasses: Il vous restes des passes d’utilisation sur ce hotspot. Voulez vous les effacer et enregistrer à nouveau?
fr.msg_index2_06_daypasses_will_be_lost: Tous les passes d’utilisation seront perdus .
fr.msg_index2_08_enter_act_number: Inserez le code d'ACTIVATION pour utilizer l’internet!
fr.msg_index2_20_paid_info_text: Thank you for choosing the LMA Systems Paid WiFi Service. You will receive unlimited 4G/LTE connectivity without personalised advertisement and no data will be collected.
fr.msg_index2_21_free_info_text: Thank you for choosing the LMA Systems Free WiFi Service. You will receive unlimited 4G/LTE connectivity, personalised advertisement and your anonymised data will be collected according to the EU Data Protection Laws.
fr.msg_index2_22_price_one_daypass: Price for one daypass (24 hours) is :&nbsp
fr.msg_p_act_fail_02_no_more_daypass: Il ne vous rests plus de passe d’utilisation.
fr.msg_p_act_fail_03_buy_or_contact: Achetez des passes d’utilisation ou contactez notre service client.
fr.msg_p_new_05_include_country_code: Choisissez vote pays and entrez votre numero de portable.
fr.msg_p_new_11_billing_payment_info: Les detailles de facturation et de paiement: seront utiliser pour les achats a venire (e.g passes d’utilisation) et pur la garantie de la location du hotspot.
fr.msg_p_new_12_email_address_info: Addresse e-mail: sera utiliser pour les confirmations et les factures.
fr.msg_f_new_01_please_fill_out_fields_belo: Remplissez les champs ci-dessous pour recevoir une utilisation gratuite et illimitée.
fr.msg_f_new_11_how_long_will_stay: Combien de temps comptez vous rester?
fr.msg_f_new_15_please_fill_out_form: Remplissez la section suivante pour vous identifier sans avoir besoin de remplire les formulaires a nouveau. Vous aller recevoir un code d’activation par message texto (sans frais).
fr.msg_f_new_16_grand_permission: j'accepte de recevoir des messages basés sur ma localisation
fr.msg_p_dp_add_01_creditcard_associated: Nous utiliserons la carte de credit associées avec ce compte
fr.msg_p_enter_code_01_will_receive_sms: Vous alley recevoir un texto avec votre numero d’activation PERSONEL tout de suite.
fr.msg_p_enter_code_02_please_store_number: Gardez le, vous en aurez besoin pour activer les passes d’utilisation.
fr.msg_p_payment_04_cvv: CVV (CODE A 3 CHIFFRES AU DOS DE LA CARTE)
fr.msg_p_summary_01_24-daypass_stay_active: Le passe d’utilisation de 24-heures sera actif jusqu’a:
fr.msg_general_02_advert_popup_text: La page sera télécharger plus tard…
fr.msg_general_17_terms_accept: J’accepte les conditions de service et la police de confidentialitée en accord avec la RGPD
fr.msg_general_18_banner_click: Cliquez sur la bannière pour recevoir automatiquement le bon/annonce par courrier électronique.
fr.msg_general_19_how_many_daypass_buy: Combien de passes d’utilisation voulez vous acheter?
fr.msg_general_23_phone_number_will_activat: Nous enverrons un texto a votre telephone avec un code pour activer le service
